courseName: LSE-Sciences Po Double MSc Political Economy of Development
universityName: London School of Economics and Political Science
description: Ask LSEDevelopment is not just about increasing growth and political and social rights. It is about creating self-sustaining institutions that liberate societies from low-level deprivation traps by increasing productivity, freedom, and cooperative interdependence. The Double Degree in this Political Economy of Development gives you the theory and practical tools to drive such transformations forward by enabling you to understand why some societies have succeeded and others have failed.Â
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
